title: JonDoFox+
name: jondofox
description: JonDoFox provides strong browser privacy and security, especially in the scope of anonymization networks like Tor, JonDonym and VPNs. You may use it together with any of these systems to get better privacy and defend your browser against fingerprinting attacks. See more here: https://github.com/jondos/jondofox/wiki
author: JonDos, Germany

preferences.name: preferencesButton
preferences.title: JonDoFox custom settings
preferences.description: Configure custom browser settings and get general configuration options, infos and help for JonDoFox here.
preferences.label: Configure
